dct_title_s: The Middle East / John Bartholomew & Son Ltd.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Depths shown by bathymetric tints. Map shows international boundaries, routes (2 categories), railways, caravan routes, oil pipelines, sand deserts, water features, and populated places. Ancillary map: continuation of Arabian Peninsula. In lower left margin: "2970."
